title: Quarto extension providing the corporate identity of the Flemish government for reports
description: This quarto extension builds on the quarto book format and provides the corporate identity of the Flemish government for reports. A full example is available in the source folder in the GitHub repo. Visit https://inbo.github.io/flandersqmd-book/ to view the rendered version of the example.
